audioEnhancement.title: Pro Audio Enhancement
audioEnhancement.description: Removes filler words, long pauses, background noise, and normalizes audio levels for crystal-clear Russian and English speech

videoAssembly.title: Auto Video Assembly
videoAssembly.description: Seamlessly stitches together video fragments for smooth storytelling flow

viralClips.title: Viral Clips Generator
viralClips.description: Creates engaging short-form content for TikTok, Reels, and YouTube Shorts with trending music

export.title: One-Click Export
export.description: Export in multiple formats optimized for different social media platforms

hero.title: Transform Your Media
hero.description: Upload your audio or video files and let our AI process them with advanced algorithms tailored for each media type.

loginRequired.title: Please log in to upload your media
loginRequired.description: You must be logged in to use the AI-powered media processor.

uploadArea.title: Drop your media file here, or browse
uploadArea.description: Supports video files (MP4, MOV, MKV, AVI, WEBM) and audio files (MP3, WAV, M4A, AAC, FLAC)

denoise.title: Denoise
denoise.description: Remove background noise and enhance audio clarity using advanced AI algorithms.

removeFillers.title: Remove Fillers
removeFillers.description: Automatically detect and remove "um", "uh", and other filler words from speech.

summarize.title: Summarize
summarize.description: Generate an intelligent summary of your content with key points and insights.

auth.registrationSuccessful: Registration successful! You can now log in.

notFound.title: Page Not Found
notFound.description: The page you're looking for seems to have vanished into the digital void. Don't worry, even the best explorers sometimes take a wrong turn.

shorts.description: Upload a video and instantly get a short AI-edited clip optimized for TikTok, Reels, or Shorts.
